meanings.sent1: The ultrasmart student aced the test effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: She is known for her ultrasmart problem-solving skills.
meanings.sent3: The ultrasmart robot outsmarted its creators in a playful game.
meanings.sent4: Her ultrasmart mind was like a well-oiled machine, never missing a beat.
meanings.sent5: The ultrasmart detective cracked the case in record time.

meanings.definition: A person who is exceptionally intelligent or quick-witted.
meanings.sent1: The ultrasmart in the class always had the answer first.
meanings.sent2: He was considered the ultrasmart of the group due to his quick thinking.
meanings.sent3: The ultrasmart at the office made everyone laugh with his witty jokes.
meanings.sent4: She was the ultrasmart of the team, leading them to victory.
meanings.sent5: The ultrasmart amazed everyone with his vast knowledge during the quiz.
